page.title: 05FASHION IN MARSDEN
page.content: { In Marsden the latest fashions are Roman sandles and baby legs and white jackets.Most,people wear splash T shirts and spiked belts with them.I like sweat bands.Some people like Chinese boot.Quite a lot of people wear mini skirts and luminous socks.Tea bag t shirts are also fashionable.Some people wear baggys and zip jeans .The fashion colour this year is grey.Crumpled track suits and with one earring for boys and blazers and denimjackets.Some people wear leather jackets with a patch on the shoulder. Baby legs-trousers that fasten just below the knee. T bag T shirts-t shirts with lots of tiny holes. {Sarah Earith,Angela Matthews ,Davina {Gilroy { _June 1985
